creator: jslopez@forumsys.com
text:
Using this target
  <target name="dist" depends="compile">
    <mkdir dir="${dist}"/>
    <jar jarfile="${dist}/${app.Name}.jar"
      basedir="${build}"
      manifest="manifest"/>
  </target>
ant is not placing the manifest file in the jar file. It is placing the default 
one

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
Has been fixed and will be included in 1.4 release. In the interim add a blank 
line at the top of your manifest file (the bug causes the first line to be 
ignored which is not much of a problem on a well formed manifest file).
